alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lowndes and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Logan, or 7 miles east of Fort Deposit, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Deposit, Logan, Lowndes County Airport, Grady, Sellers, Strata, Dublin, Davenport, Naftel, Ramer and Lapine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
